title: Some American sculpture
creator_credit: Frederick H Stein, United States Information Service and Sketches
brief_description: Offers a view of the work, philosophy and work habits of three modern American sculptors - Jennie Lea Knight who works with wood; George Mueller who works with steel; and, Fred Eversley who works with plastic.
creator_credit_for_label: Frederick H Stein, United States Information Service and Sketches
